testcase.name: TC13_manage account testi
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici login sayfasina gider.......................................passed And username textbox kutusuna gecerli username "memur" girer................passed And password textbox kutusuna gecerli password "cucumber01." girer..........passed And sign in butonuna tiklayarak giris yapar.................................passed

testcase.name: Employee customer account olusturur
testcase.system-out: Given Employee My operations a tiklar.......................................passed And employee Manage Accounts tiklar.........................................passed And employee Create a new Account a tiklar..................................passed And employee Description text box a "buraya hesap aciklamasi yazilmali" bilgisini girer bos birakamaz.passed And employee Balance text box'a dolar miktarini sadece rakam girer..........passed And employee Account Type secimi yapabilir..................................passed And employee Account Status Type secimi yapabilmelidir......................passed And Employee kutusundan bir calisan secebilmelidir..........................passed Then kullanici sign in butonuna tiklayarak Manage Account sayfasina geri doner.passed
